title: ISic003355. Funerary altar for Thalpon
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΘΑΛΠΩΝΧΑΙΡΕ
2ΧΡΗΣΤΕΚΑΙΑΜΕΜ
3ΠΤΕΘΑΛΠ.Ν
4ΕΝΘΑΔΕΚΕΙΜΑΙΕΞΑ
5ΕΤΗΣΔΕΘΑΝΩΝ
6ΝΗΠΙΟΣΩΚΥΜΟΡΟΣ

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy

English translation

Thalpon, farewell, worthy and blameless Thalpon! Here I lie, having died aged six, a child of swift fate.

Italian translation

Talpone, addio, buono ed irreprensibile Talpone! Qui giaccio, e morto a sei anni, bambine di celere fato.

commentary

The name Thalpon is not otherwise attested.

bibliography

  • Ferrua 1941 217-218 no.99 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001456
  • Manganaro 2001 87 no.VII bis https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001806
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
